attributes.additional_details:
2100 seafarers were sacked by P&O European Ferries(Dover) in
    1988 during a legal industrial dispute.Employment terms and conditions
    were changed resulting in more hours worked for less pay,and a reduction in crewing. 25 years later,the seafarers have still not received any compensation
    despite the ILO ruling that they were sacked illegally.Please give justice and compensation to the sacked seafarers.Thank you.
